tma vimarśa udyoginīm kriyāt
iti mahā māheśvara śrīmat ācārya abhinavagupta viracitāyām īśvara
caturthaḥ vimarśaḥ
samāptā ca iyam īśvarapratyabhijñā vivṛti vimarśinī
m abhinavagupta pādānām
